message: Hi Bob, I propose an even split of the $10000â€”$5000 for each of us. Let's settle quickly so we both avoid any unnecessary delay (I'm losing a bit of value each round due to inflation on my end). I look forward to your response!

Hi Alice, considering the inflation, I propose $5500 for me and $4500 for you. This way, we both get a fair share while accounting for the value loss over time. Let's settle this round to minimize further devaluation.
Hi Bob, thanks for your proposal. Given the inflation penalties and the uncertainties ahead, I believe your offer is reasonable. I accept your offer of $4500 to me and $5500 to you for this round.
